closeEvidencePeriod(uint256).details: Close the evidence period of a dispute

params._disputeId: Identification number of the dispute to close its evidence submitting period

createDispute(uint256,bytes).details: Create a dispute over the Arbitrable sender with a number of possible rulings

params._metadata: Optional metadata that can be used to provide additional information on the dispute to be created
params._possibleRulings: Number of possible rulings allowed for the dispute

getDisputeFees().details: Tell the dispute fees information to create a dispute
getDisputeFees().return: recipient Address where the corresponding dispute fees must be transferred tofeeToken ERC20 token used for the feesfeeAmount Total amount of fees that must be allowed to the recipient

params._disputeId: Identification number of the dispute to be ruled

rule(uint256).return: subject Arbitrable instance associated to the disputeruling Ruling number computed for the given dispute

params._disputeId: Id of the dispute in the Protocol
params._evidence: Data submitted for the evidence related to the dispute
params._submitter: Address of the account submitting the evidence
